channel.title: Fusing ISO's?
channel.description: Well, a friend of mine has FFVII on a bunch of CD's. I have some DVD's, so I wanted to burn myself a copy. Is there a way to make ISO's of the CD's, then fuse them into one? I'd really hate to have it on CD's because of all the skipping it would have. Thanks in advance. ;)

item.title: Fusing ISO's?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

frank_:

you could try just burning the images onto the disk, still as images, and mount them with daemon tools

That’s the best option imo. For most games you can’t really fuse together the disk, as the installer is set up to run in that particular way. I know there are some games that have a file index for the installer that can allow for modification and joining of the files, but I wouldn’t know about this game.
